Interface Issues


  • @Immutable
public interface Issues
    Github issues.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id: 277ea4d1ac1300f4db1e804092e800ae0965ca5b $
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com), Chris Rebert (github@chrisrebert.com)
    See Also:
    Issues API
